}} 'Gary U.S. Bonds' (born 'Gary Levone Anderson', June 6, 1939, Jacksonville,
Florida) {{cite book
| first= Joseph last= Murrells year= 1978 title= The Book of Golden Discs
| edition= 2nd publisher= Barrie and Jenkins Ltd location= London page= 132
| isbn= 0-214-20512-6}} is an American rhythm and blues and rock and roll
| singer. He is also a prolific songwriter.
